actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to authorize the changing of the status of refugees from Indochina from that of a parolee to that of a permanent resident alien.

summary.text: Indo-Chinese Refugee Status Adjustment Act - Permits the Attorney General, under the Immigration and Nationality Act, to adjust the status of any alien from Indochina to permanent resident without regard to immigration quotas or lack of possession by such alien of specified required immigration documents. States such alien need only be eligible to receive an immigrant visa to qualify for such change of status.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the changing of the status of refugees from Indochina from that of a parolee to that of a permanent resident alien.
